synopsis.text: Yoshika Miyafuji, once a part of the 501st Joint Fighter Wing, has been enjoying the tranquility of her hometown after the team's disbandment. However, her peaceful days are about to be disrupted as her former superior, Mio Sakamoto, arranges for her to study at a medical school in Europe. Accompanied by Shizuka Hattori, a former student of Sakamoto, Yoshika heads back to Europe. As she returns, ominous signs of Neuroi reemergence begin to surface, prompting the scattered members of the 501st Joint Fighter Wing to reunite. Brace yourself as a formidable Neuroi looms before Yoshika and Shizuka, setting the stage for a thrilling confrontation.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
